abstract: Patrick J. Foye’s appointment comes as Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is seeking a significant expansion of the Port Authority’s portfolio.
snippet: Patrick J. Foye’s appointment comes as Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is seeking a significant expansion of the Port Authority’s portfolio.

headline.main: Cuomo Names a Deputy to Lead the Port Authority
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Names Deputy to Run Port Authority and Asks Agency to Expand Role
